com.hush.pgp
Class CanonicalSignedMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.hush.pgp.CanonicalSignedMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants
public class CanonicalSignedMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements PgpConstants

This class creates or verifies a cleartext signed message. Character encoding precedence rules: HIGHEST

  1. Specified with setCharacterEncoding.
  2. Specified in PGP SIGNED MESSAGE header.
  3. Specified in PGP SIGNATURE header.
LOWEST

verifySignatures

public Signature[] verifySignatures(Key key,
                                    boolean dieOnFailure)
                             throws InvalidSignatureException
Iterates through each signature the message, and if it matches the key ID on the given key, an attempt is made to verify the signature. All the signatures that are verified are returned.

If a signature failes verification, an exception will only be thrown if dieOnFailure is set to true.

Parameters:
key - the key with which to attempt verification
dieOnFailure - if true, throw an exception if a signature verification fails
Returns:
an array of verified signatures
Throws:
InvalidSignatureException - if die=OnFailure is true, and a signature fails to verify
